channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Scale
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Scale

item.title: CVE-2020-4378|2024-08-04T08:00:07.360Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 could allow a privileged authenticated user to perform unauthorized actions using a specially crated HTTP POST command. IBM X-Force ID: 179157.

item.title: CVE-2020-4273|2024-08-04T08:00:06.950Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 4.2 and 5.0 could allow a local unprivileged attacker with intimate knowledge of the enviornment to execute commands as root using specially crafted input. IBM X-Force ID: 175977.

item.title: CVE-2020-4348|2024-08-04T08:00:06.963Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 4.2.0.0 through 4.2.3.21 and 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 could allow an authenticated GUI user to perform unauthorized actions due to missing function level access control. IBM X-Force ID: 178414

item.title: CVE-2021-38882|2024-08-04T01:51:20.856Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.1.0 through 5.1.1.1 could allow a privileged admin to destroy filesystem audit logging records before expiration time. IBM X-Force ID: 209164.

item.title: CVE-2020-4349|2024-08-04T08:00:07.711Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 178423.

item.title: CVE-2020-4217|2024-08-04T08:00:07.348Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: The IBM Spectrum Scale 4.2 and 5.0 file system component is affected by a denial of service security vulnerability. An attacker can force the Spectrum Scale mmfsd/mmsdrserv daemons to unexpectedly exit, impacting the functionality of the Spectrum Scale cluster and the availability of file systems managed by Spectrum Scale. IBM X-Force ID: 175067.

item.title: CVE-2020-4350|2024-08-04T08:00:07.361Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 178424.

item.title: CVE-2020-4357|2024-08-04T08:00:07.386Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 178761.

item.title: CVE-2020-4358|2024-08-04T08:00:07.619Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 178762.

item.title: CVE-2020-4379|2024-08-04T08:00:07.374Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.4.4 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 179158.
